Author: ksj-4
Text: thanks. it’d hard to separatebeing happy with my body now and being angry at the eating disorder, so thank you for trying to put it into perspective xx

Author: wishamfwould
Text: This is not the way to think. Be grateful you are not overweight, and be happy you like your body. Do not be happy that you had to starve yourself and damage your organs to get there, even with no visible symptoms, you still put your body through LOTS of stress. I would never wish that on anyone, I’m really glad you recovered although I am sorry it wasn’t a good experience.
